Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Authorizes the Dormitory Authority to provide public financing options to build new police facilities in certain areas
Summary: Authorizes the Dormitory Authority to provide public financing options to build new police facilities in areas that currently have one police precinct or facility covering 300,000 or more people.
LawCode: Add ยง1680-s, amd ยง1676, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing the Dormitory Authority to provide public financing options to build new police facilities in certain areas
